languages.text: "Владайм Токара, за свои преступления ты будешь повешен. Пусть вид твоего хладного трупа станет свидетельством того, что хладному торгу больше нет места на Футфоле".
"Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."
languages.original_text: "Владайм Токара, за свои преступления ты будешь повешен. Пусть вид твоего хладного трупа станет свидетельством того, что хладному торгу больше нет места на Футфоле".

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse bear witness that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall anymore."
"Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse bear witness that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall anymore."

"Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."
"Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

languages.text: “弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，你重罪难逃，必须上绞刑架。届时，你冰冷的尸体将会见证——冷市贸易在落脚港不再有立足之地。”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

traits.locale_text: “弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，你会因你犯下的罪行被绞死。届时，你冰冷的尸体将会见证，冷市贸易在落脚港不再有立足之地。”

languages.text: 「ヴラダイム・トカラ。お前の罪は絞首刑だ。お前の冷たくなった死体は、冷たき取引がフットフォールにもう居場所がないことを、証明することになろう」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイム・トカラ。お前の罪は絞首刑だ。お前の冷たくなった死体は、冷たき取引がフットフォールにもう居場所がないことを、証言することになろう」

languages.text: «Vladaym Tocara, será ahorcado por sus crímenes. Que su cadáver frío sea prueba de que el Comercio Frío ya no tiene cabida en Paso».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

traits.locale_text: «Vladaym Tocara, será ahorcado por sus crímenes. Que su cadáver frío sea testigo de que el Comercio Frío ya no tiene cabida en Paso».

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara, Ihr werdet für Eure Verbrechen gehängt. Der Anblick Eurer kalten Leiche soll als Beweis dienen, dass der Kalthandel auf Footfall keinen Platz mehr hat."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, Ihr werdet für Eure Verbrechen gehängt. Der Anblick Eurer kalten Leiche soll bezeugen, dass der Kalthandel auf Footfall keinen Platz mehr hat."

languages.text: « Vladaym Tocara, vous serez pendu pour vos crimes. Que la vue de votre cadavre prouve à tous que le Commerce Froid n'a plus sa place à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym Tocara, vous serez pendu pour vos crimes. Que la vue de votre cadavre fasse comprendre à tous que le Commerce Froid n'a plus sa place à Castel. »

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara, suçlarının karşılığı olarak asılacaksın. Cesedinin soğukluğu, Soğuk Ticaret'in artık Binliman'da yeri olmadığının kanıtı olsun."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, you will be hanged for your crimes. Let the sight of your cold corpse serve as proof that the Cold Trade has no place on Footfall any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, suçlarının karşılığı olarak asılacaksın. Cesedinin soğukluğu, Soğuk Ticaret'in artık Binliman'da yeri olmadığının kanıtı olsun."
